con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsdl="http://uciext.ws.hw3/wsdl"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <wsdl:submitOrder> <!--Optional:--> <wsdl:order> <vendorCode>111</vendorCode> <vendorName>abc</vendorName> <orderNumber>329832</orderNumber> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <productOrder> <productSku>111003392854</productSku> <productName>Kindle Fire</productName> <orderQuantity>5.0</orderQuantity> </productOrder> <productOrder> <productSku>111003392994</productSku> <productName>Kindle Paperwhite</productName> <orderQuantity>5.0</orderQuantity> </productOrder> </wsdl:order> </wsdl:submitOrder> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
